title: PROBLEM WITH CLUB CHAT
body: I Have a problem with my club. Everything was going well, until 1 member of my club started showing without his actuall name (its says **SummonerName). I removed him and send an invitation again (many times). The member accepted the invitations but he cant write or read or even see the chat. The only thing he can see is a ''joining...''. I see him like he didn't accept the invitation (pending) and join the club but he accepts all the time.

replies.body: This is a strange issue that I haven't seen before.  Have your member submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look and find out what's going on.  We'll reply asap!
